channel.title: Error Connecting
channel.description: I keep failing to connect to any server I try to connect to.

item.title: Error Connecting
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

lardain:

Just like sk8erdude461 said, make sure you have the latest java. If you are not able to play a webclient and don`t know how to whitelist a client (which is easy) You can always inspect the page element to get the jar file. A self signed jar will always load if its downloaded. But i assume it has nothing to do with the webclient part since it loads a few times right?

It’s also not our, nor the players, job to debug and find out an issue with a server you’re playing.
Refrain from posting error topics when it is not your server. If you have an issue on someone else’s server, you must talk to them. They have the source code, so they are the ones that have the ability to solve your issue.

Read full topic

item.title: Error Connecting
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Pest, post:4, topic:550626”]ashbash and i are having the same problem.
like, when we open a client, it either white screens or loads to the login screen, and then once we login, it crashes.[/quote]
Have you updated your Java and (if on a webclient) whitelisted the website for Java security?

If not your own server, you must contact the server owner(s).

Read full topic
